participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and empathetic, Alex is deeply passionate about causes they believe in, particularly animal welfare. They often express their creativity through cooking and music.
participant_1.background: I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare. I have always been close to my parents. I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality. I've been working at my current job for a year. I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious yet anxious, Jordan is determined to make her mark with her juicing bar while juggling the pressures of a mundane job. She has a colorful personality and a creative flair.
participant_2.background: I'm afraid of not being able to make my juicing bar a success. I dyed my hair pink. I work a dead end 9 to 5 job as a snakeskin oil salesman. I like to go to websites that have archery tips and tricks. I lost my favorite fishing pole in a boating accident.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing okay, thanks! I'm a little nervous about my new business venture, but I'm excited too.
What kind of business are you starting?
It's a juicing bar. I'm really passionate about healthy eating and I think it's a great way to make a difference in people's lives.
That's awesome! I'm sure it will be a success.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into vinyl records right now.
Me too! I have a small collection of my own.
That's awesome! What kind of records do you have?
I have a lot of classic rock, jazz, and blues.
Nice! I have a lot of indie rock, folk, and soul.
